text: Dominico Felipe "Don" Martina (1 May 1935 – 21 December 2024) was a Curaçaoan politician. He was the Prime Minister of the Netherlands Antilles. His first term lasted from November 1979 to October 1984 and his second term from January 1986 to July 1988. Martina died on 21 December 2024 in Willemstad, Curaçao at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of the Netherlands Antilles
title: Don Martina
